agentUtterance.text: How can I help you Today?

userUtterance.text: do you offer inside wire protection

requestBody.query: do you offer inside wire protection

200.answer:
Yes, With our Inside Wire Protection plan, most repairs are covered with the cost of your monthly subscription.
For a flat monthly fee of $13-$15, you can get a plan that covers inspection and repairs on most inside jack and wiring problems, including:
1.Charges for a technician to visit your home and isolate the problem. 
2.Fee for a technician to professionally repair/restore your service.
3.Cost of materials needed to fix damaged jacks and wiring

userUtterance.text: do i get any warranty if i purchase it

agentUtterance.text: what do i need to do after disconnecting the service

requestBody.query: what do i need to do after disconnecting the service

200.answer:
There are 3 things to keep in mind after disconnecting your Brightspeed service:If you leased a modem or router, you need to return it within 30 days of disconnection. You can get more information on that here https://www.brightspeed.com/help/internet/modems-and-routers/how-to-pack-and-return-the-modem. If you paid a deposit when you set up your Brightspeed service, your deposit plus any interest will be applied to your final balance. We'll send you a closing bill by mail that shows any outstanding balance owed or credit due.
If you were enrolled in autopay - clickhere https://www.brightspeed.com/help/account/autopay/does-canceling-your-brightspeed-service-cancel-autopay-too to learn how disconnection will affect your payments.

agentUtterance.text:
There are 3 things to keep in mind after disconnecting your Brightspeed service:
1. If you leased a modem or router, you need to return it within 30 days of disconnection. You can get more information on that {{https://www.brightspeed.com/help/internet/modems-and-routers/how-to-pack-and-return-the-modem | here}}.
2. If you paid a deposit when you set up your Brightspeed service, your deposit plus any interest will be applied to your final balance. We'll send you a closing bill by mail that shows any outstanding balance owed or credit due.
3. If you were enrolled in autopay - {{https://www.brightspeed.com/help/account/autopay/does-canceling-your-brightspeed-service-cancel-autopay-too | click here}} to learn how disconnection will affect your payments.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
